lyrics.text: Lesson 117. Tommy's Breakfast. Listen to the tape, then answer this question. What does she mean by change in the last sentence?
lyrics.translation: 第117课。汤米的早餐。听录音，然后回答这个问题。在最后一句话中，她所说的“换”是什么意思？

lyrics.text: When my husband was going into the dining room this morning, he dropped some coins on the floor.
lyrics.translation: 今天早上，当我丈夫走进餐厅时，他不小心把一些硬币掉在了地板上。

lyrics.text: There were coins everywhere. We looked for them, but we could not find them all.
lyrics.translation: 到处都是硬币。我们寻找它们，但我们找不到全部。

lyrics.text: While we were having breakfast, our little boy, Tommy, found two small coins on the floor.
lyrics.translation: 当我们正在吃早饭的时候，我们的小男孩，汤米，在地板上发现了两枚小硬币。

lyrics.text: He put them both into his mouth. We both tried to get the coins, but it was too late. Tommy had already swallowed them.
lyrics.translation: 他把两枚硬币都放进了嘴里。我们俩都试图去抢硬币，但已经太晚了。汤米已经把硬币吞下去了。

lyrics.text: Later that morning, when I was doing the housework, my husband phoned me from the office.
lyrics.translation: 那天上午晚些时候，当我正在做家务时，我丈夫从办公室打电话给我。

lyrics.text: I don't know, I answered. Tommy's been to the toilet three times this morning, but I haven't had any change yet.
lyrics.translation: 我不知道，我已经回答过了。汤米今天早上去了三次厕所，但我还没有收到任何零钱。
